Text.Page:
On my way here from Wyvern Watch I saw a wondrous sight. It was a mycanar, a type of nature spirit like a ghilliedhu, and I thought I saw an enormous greatsword thrust into its back.

I didn't stay to fight it, of course, but I haven't been able to stop thinking about that sword.

Are you curious yet, ? I certainly am. Find it, and bring me that sword. It's a piece of history.

This is the sword? But it's not old at all! It's a mystery, . Perhaps the giants are still about...somewhere. Or perhaps not.

I love a mystery, don't you?
Yes, I know that mycanar's big and tough. Why do you suppose I didn't want to fight it myself? Still, I'll pay you well for the sword.
